question: i prayed istikarah namaz for marriage purposes and i had this dream,what happened was there were loads of people and the girl i prayed for was there
answer:
QUESTION
i prayed istikarah namaz for marriage purposes and i had this dream,what happened was there were loads of people and the girl i prayed for was there and she took me to this side room and she showed me her face(she wears hijab)could you please interpret it for me please.i think this is a very good sign
ANSWER


Share:
If you feel contentment in your heart about the girl after the Istikhaara, then you may regard that as guidance from Allah.

It is also important for you to make Mashwara (consult) with responsible people in making a decision for marriage.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
